wikipedia_page.main: Beverley Redfern (born c.1956 in Mtarfa, Malta) is a British mountain runner who won the 1990 World Mountain Running Championships.She also won the Ben Nevis Race in 1989, the Coniston Fell Race in 1993, and Sierre-Zinal, also in 1993.Redfern still holds the women's course record for the Ben Lomond Hill Race which she set in 1990.
